name: Imp Knight
description:
Fight for the last defense of your kingdom, and battle against the corruption of the demons by casting your spell to defeat the demonic knight!

Refuel mana at the magic fountain and use your chance to fight the Imp Knight!
After each shot you have to approach the fountain and tap Shift as fast as you can to fill all of 3 Orbs and have another opportunity to hit the Knight.
Dramatic OST will help you to feel the atomsphere of epic battle.

WASD\Arrow - Movement

Space - Fire

Shift - Refuel Mana
